definitions.definition: a unit of luminance , being the luminance of a perfectly diffusing surface emitting light at the rate of ⁄ π candela per square metre . Also known as a blondel.

main_definition: ( physics ) a unit of luminance , being the luminance of a perfectly diffusing surface emitting light at the rate of ⁄ π candela per square metre . Also known as a blondel.
